SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server

Class ServerApp

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.ServerApp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Server, Remote
public class ServerApp extends Object implements Server
Server application that handles room management and client interactions.

    • fetchRooms

      Fetches the list of available rooms.
      Specified by:
      fetchRooms in interface Server
      Parameters:
      client - The client requesting the room list.
      Returns:
      List of RoomInfo objects representing the available rooms.

    • createRoom

      public RoomInfo createRoom(Client client, String roomName, int numPlayers, String creatorUsername) throws AlreadyInRoomException, CreateRoomException
      Creates a new room with the specified parameters.
      Specified by:
      createRoom in interface Server
      Parameters:
      client - The client creating the room.
      roomName - The name of the room.
      numPlayers - The number of players in the room.
      creatorUsername - The username of the room creator.
      Returns:
      RoomInfo object representing the newly created room.
      Throws:
      AlreadyInRoomException - If the client is already in another room.
      CreateRoomException - If the room cannot be created due to invalid parameters or name conflicts.

    • joinRoom

      public RoomInfo joinRoom(Client client, String roomName, String username) throws AlreadyInRoomException, JoinRoomException, GameAlreadyStartedException
      Allows a client to join an existing room.
      Specified by:
      joinRoom in interface Server
      Parameters:
      client - The client joining the room.
      roomName - The name of the room to join.
      username - The username of the joining client.
      Returns:
      RoomInfo object representing the room joined.
      Throws:
      AlreadyInRoomException - If the client is already in another room.
      JoinRoomException - If the room cannot be joined due to invalid parameters or if the room does not exist.
      GameAlreadyStartedException - If the game in the room has already started.

    • reconnect

      public CompleteGameInfo reconnect(Client client, String roomName, String username) throws AlreadyInRoomException, JoinRoomException
      Reconnects a client to their existing game session in a room.
      Specified by:
      reconnect in interface Server
      Parameters:
      client - The client reconnecting.
      roomName - The name of the room.
      username - The username of the reconnecting client.
      Returns:
      CompleteGameInfo object containing the state of the game the client is reconnecting to.
      Throws:
      AlreadyInRoomException - If the client is already in another room.
      JoinRoomException - If the room cannot be joined.

    • readyUp

      Marks a client as ready in their current room.
      Specified by:
      readyUp in interface Server
      Parameters:
      client - The client marking as ready.
      color - The chosen color of the client.
      Returns:
      RoomInfo object representing the updated room state.
      Throws:
      RoomException - If the client is not in any room.

      Specified by:

    • executeAction

      public void executeAction(Client client, GameAction action) throws InvalidActionException, NotYourTurnException, NotInGameException
      Executes a game action for a client in their current room.
      Specified by:
      executeAction in interface Server
      Parameters:
      client - The client performing the action.
      action - The game action to be executed.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - If the action is invalid.
      NotYourTurnException - If it is not the client's turn.
      NotInGameException - If the client is not in a game.

    • validateNewClientAndGetRoom

      private Room validateNewClientAndGetRoom(Client client, String roomName, String username) throws AlreadyInRoomException, JoinRoomException
      Checks that the username and the room are correct and returns the room
      Parameters:
      client - that is trying to join the room
      roomName - that the user whants to join
      username - that the client chose
      Returns:
      the it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.controller.room
      Throws:
      AlreadyInRoomException - if there is already a player with that username in the room
      JoinRoomException - if the rooom that the player is trying to join doesn't exist
